EmailTemplate.name: CS Team Leader TL Development Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Feedback is Needed! Team Lead Development Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Team Lead Development Survey
Global Talent Development is committed to giving WEX Customer Service Professionals the tools and knowledge they need to succeed on the job and grow professionally. Investing in our people is our number one goal to ensure long-term growth and success for our business.
In preparation for your attendance in the Team Lead Development Workshop, we are very interested in hearing your feedback. As part of the Team Lead Development Program we would like to gather useful information about your experience with your direct reports.
Please complete the Team Lead Development Survey by [ENTER DATE]. https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScXINDWtCEqXWD8ehMV9sPDnOri-P4-TRwHOWyso0zGdFRcSg/viewform?usp=sf_link
The Survey has 10 questions and should take you approximately 5 minutes to complete.
